clinical_history: Patient with persistent infection and fever of unknown origin.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in pancreas with SUVmax 4.88.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Focal uptake in pancreas consistent with post-surgical changes.
Mild inflammatory uptake in pancreas region.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
